## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G41970](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G41970)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CARK4, MRI</u>
- **Gene Name:** Cytosolic ABA Receptor Kinase 4, MARIS
- **Description:**   Protein kinase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2064557
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
